description: Lists the contacts present in a specific contact list.

parameters.name: ContactListName
parameters.description: The name of the contact list.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: A filter that can be applied to a list of contacts. FilteredStatus (string) --- The status by which you are filtering: OPT_IN or OPT_OUT. TopicFilter (dict) --- Used for filtering by a specific topic preference. TopicName (string) --- The name of a topic on which you wish to apply the filter. UseDefaultIfPreferenceUnavailable (boolean) --- Notes that the default subscription status should be applied to a contact because the contact has not noted their preference for subscribing to a topic.

nested_params.name: FilteredStatus
nested_params.description: The status by which you are filtering: OPT_IN or OPT_OUT.

nested_params.name: TopicFilter
nested_params.description: Used for filtering by a specific topic preference.

nested_params.name: TopicName
nested_params.description: The name of a topic on which you wish to apply the filter.

nested_params.name: UseDefaultIfPreferenceUnavailable
nested_params.description: Notes that the default subscription status should be applied to a contact because the contact has not noted their preference for subscribing to a topic.

nested_items.name: Contacts
nested_items.description: The contacts present in a specific contact list.

nested_items.name: TopicPreferences
nested_items.description: The contact's preference for being opted-in to or opted-out of a topic.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionStatus
nested_items.description: The contact's subscription status to a topic which is either OPT_IN or OPT_OUT.

nested_items.name: TopicDefaultPreferences
nested_items.description: The default topic preferences applied to the contact.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionStatus
nested_items.description: The contact's subscription status to a topic which is either OPT_IN or OPT_OUT.

nested_items.name: UnsubscribeAll
nested_items.description: A boolean value status noting if the contact is unsubscribed from all contact list topics.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: A timestamp noting the last time the contact's information was updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A string token indicating that there might be additional contacts available to be listed. Copy this token to a subsequent call to ListContacts with the same parameters to retrieve the next page of contacts.
